Setting up hardware¶

Before setting up KNX Point API environment, you need to make sure you have correctly set up the required hardware.

Development Kit¶

Two nRF52840 DKs are required to run the KNX IoT demo application. For information on how to start working with the devices, refer to Getting started with nRF52 Series page.

nRF Sniffer for 802.15.4¶

For information on how to start working with the Nordic nRF52840-Dongle as sniffer, refer to nRF Sniffer for 802.15.4 page.
